# Vendored Libraries

This directory contains vendored dependencies that are shipped with InspIRCd to avoid users needing to install them manually.

## bcrypt

**Name** &mdash; Openwall bcrypt

**Last Updated** &mdash; 2018-08-14 (v1.3)
